successes.title: cookoo™ - the watch for the connected generation
successes.description: Stay connected anytime, anywhere with the cookoo watch—the wearable extension of your smartphone that helps manage your connected life.

Pledges.description: Thank you for your support. As a backer of our project, we will send you a thank you a post-card expressing our appreciation for your contribution to the project and will keep you up-to date on the latest cookoo™ watch developments.

NEW UPDATE June 18, 2012 - ONE COOKOO™ Keychain: Get one (1) of the first COOKOO Keychains from ConnecteDevice™! The keychain comes with a free Android or iOS Connected App™ and free shipping in the USA (add $5 for shipping to Canada and $10 for international shipping). The retail on the keychain will be $39.95 and you will be the first to receive yours in September.  If you already pledged, add this amount to your current pledge and we'll know you want one (1) keychain to be added to your pledge. If you want more than one, simply add a multiple of this amount to your current pledge.  For example $46 ($51--Canada, $56--International) for two and $69 ($75--Canada, $79--International) for three keychains.

NEW UPDATE July 1, 2012 - WATCH BAND ONLY MULTIPACK: One (1) watchband of each color (Black, Pink, White, and Blue) for your COOKOO™ watch PLUS a tool to help you swap the watch bands yourself.  Add this Watch Band Only Multipack to any COOKOO watch order.  NOTE:  THIS PACK DOES NOT INCLUDE A COOKOO WATCH OR KEYCHAIN.  NO ADDITIONAL SHIPPING CHARGES APPLY FOR CANADIAN AND INTERNATIONAL BACKERS.

FIRST BACKERS get a special treat!  One of the first 250 black on black first edition cookoo™ watches at 50% off MSRP.  The watch comes with a free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping).  The retail on this watch will be $99.95 and you will be the first to receive your watch along with a special thank you note from the team.

HOLIDAY SPECIAL: For those who want a unique gift for that special someone this year, we have one brushed stainless on black COOKOO™ watch at 30% off MSRP plus a holiday card signed by the development team. The watch comes with a free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping). The retail on this watch will be $99.95 and will ship after the first run of watches have shipped but in-time for the holidays.

One black first edition cookoo™ watch in your choice of black on black or brushed stainless on black. The watch comes with a free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping).
The retail price for this watch will be $99.95 when it hits store shelves this fall.

One PINK IS THE NEW BLACK edition cookoo™ watch. The watch comes with a free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping). Be first! The retail price for this watch will be $129.95 when it hits store shelves this fall.
One blue or white color edition cookoo™ watch.  The watch comes with a free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping).
Be first! The retail price for this watch will be $129.95 when it hits store shelves this fall.

NEW UPDATE June 18, 2012 - COOKOO™ DEVELOPER PACK: Get three (3) of the first COOKOO Keychains from ConnecteDevice™ and one (1) black on black COOKOO watch, plus a license to develop a Connected App using the Connected Device Profile™ and API.  The great news is that your keychain will ship in September, so you can start developing while you wait for your watch to ship in November.  Shipping is free in the USA (add $15 for shipping to Canada and $25 for international shipping).  If you have already pledged, add this amount to your current pledge and we'll know you want the developer pack to be added to your pledge.

COUPLES PACK: Two (2) cookoo™ watches in your choice of colors (excluding the Kickstarter edition). The couples pack comes with the free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping).

One green on black special Kickstarter-edition cookoo™ watch.  The watch comes with a free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping).
This commemorative limited-edition cookoo™ watch is numbered, comes with a certificate of authenticity, will only be available to Kickstarters, and will never be released again.

NEW UPDATE June 25, 2012 - COUPLES COMBO PACK: Get two (2) COOKOO™ watches in your choice of colors (excluding the Kickstarter edition) AND four (4) COOKOO keychains. The couples combo pack comes with the free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping).  The keychains and watches will ship together so Canadian and International backers only need to pay for shipping once.

FRIENDS AND FAMILY PACK:
Five (5) cookoo™ watches in your choice of colors (excluding the Kickstarter edition).  The family pack comes with the free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping).

NEW UPDATE June 28, 2012 - KEYCHAIN RETAILER PACK: Twenty (20) COOKOO™ keychains plus five (5) posters and one (1) point of sale display. The KEYCHAIN RETAILER PACK comes with the free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping). The displays, posters, and keychains will ship together in September.  The keychain will retail at $39.95 this fall.  Backers at other levels may add $400 + shipping to their backing level to receive this pack.

NEW UPDATE June 25, 2012 - FRIENDS AND FAMILY COMBO PACK: Five (5) COOKOO™ watches in your choice of colors (including up to ONE Kickstarter edition) AND five (5) COOKOO keychains. The family combo pack comes with the free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping). The keychains and watches will ship together so Canadian and International backers only need to pay for shipping once.
RETAILER PACK: Fifteen (15) cookoo™ watches in your choice of colors (excluding the Kickstarter edition), five (5) posters and one (1) point of sale display.
The retailer pack comes with the free Android or iOS app and free shipping in the USA (add $10 for shipping to Canada and $15 for international shipping).
